snippet.title: 112 Operator - Water Operations
snippet.description:
112 Operator - Water Operations DLC is coming to Steam on 30.12.2020!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1412760/112_Operator__Water_Operations/

New DLC Water will extend your responsibility to rivers, lakes, and seas.

About the game:
Manage emergency services in any city in the world! Take calls and dispatch rescue forces. Handle difficult situations, now depending on the weather, and traffic. Help the citizens through cataclysms and natural disasters, becoming a better emergency number operator every day! 

Follow Games Operators:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/gameops
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesOperators
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GamesOperators/
Official Website - http://www.gameops.pl/
Discord - https://discord.gg/R3PMYzY
